name: Help Mescape
description:
Hello, I am Mescape, as you can see I am trapped in this Place, with all those Flashes, I was Blinded, can't move on my own, need help from out, Good thing I was able to leave some messages across the Place. There are many of me Liked this, but I am pretty sure there are also someone helping them. I can only move Left and Right and Fire a Infinite amount of Bullets. Guide me whoever you are towards the Orb at the End. if I die, I will respawn on this Area and won't remember anything.

 Thank you
